arts.ttl: How Man City academy player Nico O'Reilly took control - Keown
arts.sum: Ex-England defender Martin Keown analyses how academy player Nico O'Reilly "took charge" during Manchester City's match against Everton.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola hails Man City's 'big win' over Everton and says securing Champions League football would be 'success' for his side this season
arts.sum: AADAM PATEL AT GOODISON PARK: Guardiola was full of praise for left back Nico O'Reilly after the 20-year-old broke the deadlock with his fifth goal of the season.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot hits back at pundits over Liverpool opinion and aims subtle jibe at Man City
arts.sum: Arne Slot accepts that pundits can have an opinion on whether the standard of the top-flight in England has fallen during a season which has seen his team turn the title race into a procession

arts.ttl: Would-be MLS suitors lining up to sign Kevin De Bruyne
arts.sum: Inter Miami owns the discovery rights to Kevin De Bruyne which means that the Miami outfit have the first chance to negotiate with him should he elect to play in Major League Soccer. Kevin De Bruyne recently confirmed that he is set to leave Manchester City at the end of the current season.

arts.ttl: Man City go fourth after late goals at Everton
arts.sum: City move into fourth place, a point behind Newcastle United prior to the Magpies’ trip to Aston Villa, while Everton remain 13th, having lost a Premier League game at home for the first time since January. Manchester City boosted their hopes of qualifying for the UEFA Champions League next season as they scored two late goals to secure a 2-0 win over Everton.

arts.ttl: Goal in Heidenheim sees Harry Kane surpass Erling Haaland for another Bundesliga goalscoring record
arts.sum: Harry Kane’s opener in Bayern Munich’s 4-0 away win over Heidenheim helped propel the Bavarians towards a straightforward win in the title race, whilst simultaneously seeing the Englishman best Erling Haaland's previous goalscoring record. The Bavarians' talisman scored the opener in their 4-0 humbling of Heidenheim on Matchday 30 with a finish that would see England's record goalscorer and captain take his tally for the season up to 24, whilst becoming the fastest player ever to reach 60 Bundesliga goals, having done so in the exact same number of games.

arts.ttl: Guardiola: It’s been an incredible adventure at Goodison Park
arts.sum: And Guardiola spoke of his enjoyment at coming to the 133-year-old venue as the Toffees get set to relocate to Everton Stadium at Bramley-Moore Dock next season. “It has been an honour to come here for many, many years to Goodison Park.

arts.ttl: Man City run-in compared to Newcastle United and Aston Villa as Blues grab Champions League advantage
arts.sum: Manchester City claimed an important win while Newcastle United Aston Villa

arts.ttl: Manchester City to step up transfer move for perfect Ederson replacement
arts.sum: Manchester City are set to return to Portugal for a replacement for Ederson, eight years after he joined from Benfica, with a move for Porto No.1 Diogo Costa this summer

arts.ttl: Man City boss Pep Guardiola lays down new challenge to Premier League rivals
arts.sum: Manchester City's fate is now in their own hands after beating Everton as Pep Guardiola's side continue to push for a top-four finish after a challenging campaign
